CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Quarterly"), "Quarterly", IF( ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c, "Direct Semi-Annual"), "Semi-Annual", IF( Custom_Schedule__c, "Custom", IF( OR(Direct_Annual__c, ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Annual")), "Annual", IF( OR(Direct_Monthly__c, ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Direct Monthly")), "Monthly", IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Selected_Payment_Type__c,"Upfront Payments")), "Upfront", "Upfront"))))))
CustomField.label: NS Payment Frequency
